title: Launch of UAE Dirham-backed Stablecoin by IHC, ADQ, and FAB
description: IHC, ADQ, and First Abu Dhabi Bank (FAB) announced plans to launch a new stablecoin backed by UAE Dirhams, regulated by UAE Central Bank and issued by FAB, intended to revolutionize payment and business transactions locally and globally, operating on the ADI blockchain developed by ADI Foundation. The stablecoin aims to enable secure digital payments and support emerging digital use cases including machine-to-machine and AI, positioning the UAE as a global fintech hub and blockchain innovation leader.
source_name: IHC, ADQ and FAB Pioneer UAE Dirham-backed Stablecoin for the Digital Economy

opportunities.title: Integration of Dirham-backed Stablecoin into E-commerce Platforms
opportunities.description: E-commerce platforms operating in or with the UAE market can integrate the new Dirham-backed stablecoin as a payment option. This would provide their customers with a secure, real-time, blockchain-based payment method and attract users interested in digital assets. Integration can also appeal to international merchants seeking easier access to the UAE market and reduce FX volatility for cross-border sales.
roadmap_steps: Assess compatibility of e-commerce platform with blockchain payment solutions
Contact stablecoin issuing consortium for technical documentation and support
Develop and test integration within checkout process
Ensure compliance with UAE payments regulations
Educate merchants and customers on using stablecoin payments
Launch and promote new payment method to target market

opportunities.title: Collaboration with Point-of-Sale (POS) System Providers for Retail Adoption
opportunities.description: Retail POS system providers can partner with the stablecoin issuers to enable UAE shoppers to pay in physical stores using the Dirham-backed stablecoin via QR code or NFC. This brings digital asset payments into mainstream retail environments, benefiting both large and SME merchants by reducing transaction costs and enabling instant settlement.
roadmap_steps: Research technical requirements for stablecoin integration in POS software
Initiate partnership discussions with issuing consortium
Develop firmware/software updates for POS terminals
Coordinate pilot trials with selected retail partners
Obtain required certifications and ensure regulatory compliance
Roll out stablecoin-enabled POS solutions to wider market

opportunities.title: Enable Stablecoin Use in Automated B2B Settlement Platforms
opportunities.description: Software companies providing automated B2B payments and AP/AR management solutions can leverage the stablecoin to instantly settle invoices in Dirhams, including smart contract-based transactions for machine-to-machine scenarios. This provides cost savings, reduces settlement risk, and can automate trade processes within the UAE and with international partners.
roadmap_steps: Evaluate existing infrastructure for blockchain payment support
Establish connections with stablecoin and blockchain API providers
Develop smart contract templates for common B2B use cases
Collaborate with corporate clients on pilot use cases
Obtain legal and regulatory advice for business and cross-border settlements
Implement commercial launch and ongoing support

opportunities.title: Partnering with Cross-border Remittance Service Providers
opportunities.description: Remittance companies can use the Dirham-backed stablecoin to provide faster and lower-cost transfers into and out of the UAE, leveraging the transparency, security, and instant settlement of blockchain. This is especially attractive for corridors between UAE and major expatriate-sending countries.
roadmap_steps: Discuss legal and compliance aspects with UAE Central Bank and local partners
Connect with stablecoin infrastructure providers for integration
Develop remittance product utilizing stablecoin rails
Pilot remittance corridor with limited countries/partners
Expand network and marketing to target expatriate populations

opportunities.title: Smart City IoT and AI Payments Using Dirham-backed Stablecoin
opportunities.description: Smart city technology companies can partner with the stablecoin issuers to enable automated payments for IoT devices and AI-driven services (e.g., smart meters, mobility services, AI-based utilities billing), providing transparent, programmable, and real-time settlements using the UAE Dirham stablecoin.
roadmap_steps: Identify IoT/AI payment use cases that benefit from stablecoins
Develop partnerships with blockchain/stablecoin providers
Build and test pilot smart contracts for automated payments
Integrate stablecoin support with IoT device firmware
Work with city authorities and utilities for regulatory and operational approval
Expand deployment across additional smart city projects
